name: Salmon with Brown Sugar and Mustard Glaze
author: Bobby Flay

ingredients.name: salt and freshly ground black pepper

instructions:
On the side burner, melt the brown sugar, honey and butter in a small saute pan over medium-high heat. Remove from the heat and whisk in the - mustard, soy sause, olive oil and ginger. Let cool.

 Preheat grill to medium heat. Brush salmon with vegetable oil and season with salt and pepper to taste. Place the salmon skin side down on the grill. Coat the flesh of the salmon fillets with the brown sugar mixture. Grill for 6 to 8 minutes to medium donaness, turning once after 5 to 6 minutes
